game.shortDescription: It's a fight for the future of the planet between the Ravagers, a merciless swarm of alien invaders, and the Earth Defense Force (EDF) in this third-person shooter.Play as four different classes in over 80 missions with a range of 800 weapons at your disposal.Co-op play supported.
game.shortDescriptionEn: It's a fight for the future of the planet between the Ravagers, a merciless swarm of alien invaders, and the Earth Defense Force (EDF) in this third-person shooter.Play as four different classes in over 80 missions with a range of 800 weapons at your disposal.Co-op play supported.

reviewHighlights.text: 혼자해도 재밌지만 친구랑 하면 엄청 재밌음. 친구랑 안해도 글로벌 사람들하고 게임해도 시스템 채팅 이용하면 대화가 다 통함. 강추
